Description
org.dellroad.typetags.core
Core classes for TypeTag's.
org.dellroad.typetags.example
 
  • Classes in org.dellroad.typetags.core used by org.dellroad.typetags.core
    Class
    Description
    TypeRestrictionException
    Specialization of ClassCastException thrown by TypeTagValidator.validate() to indicate that a value is invalid because of its actual value rather than simply by having the wrong Java type.
    TypeTagValidator
    Implemented by classes capable of runtime validation of values whose types are annotated with a @TypeTag meta-annotated annotation.
  • Classes in org.dellroad.typetags.core used by org.dellroad.typetags.example
    Class
    Description
    TypeTag
    Meta-annotation for type annotations that can be validated at compile time and runtime by TypeTags.
    TypeTagValidator
    Implemented by classes capable of runtime validation of values whose types are annotated with a @TypeTag meta-annotated annotation.
